ygData.subject: Intro and "Woof"
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, EQers: My name is Jack, and I m a new EQ player. I have to confess that my partner Chris is actually the one that got addicted, and I thought it
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings, EQers:
My name is Jack, and I'm a new EQ player. I have to confess that my
partner Chris is actually the one that got addicted, and I thought it
would be "the end" if I didn't start playing, too! :)

A while back there were a few Bears out there who played EQ on a
particular server, and I know that Chris has run across some of the
G/L/B/T PCs who buffed him, but disappeared before he could ask for
more guild info. Anyone out there know anything?

I live in St. Louis, am a 34 year old Bear employed as a statistician
and research designer for a managed health company. Chris is an LA
native, and is a dba manager for a firm in Chicago. We've been
together now for just over a year, hopefully to be together a
lifetime or two.

Glad I found the list. I'd love to hear from you folks!
Jack
OctoBear
